name: Sakura Halloween
storyline: Players control Miyu de Lioncourt, a vampire who is not invited to the Halloween party of the countess Elizabeth. Miyu is from the Lioncouft family, the most famous vampire family in France. Permantently clampered to her hair lives Sissy, a ghost, whom she met in Germany. Miyu thinks very highly of herself and thus brags a lot about how she is great and that everyone likes to spend time with her. Sissy is more down to earth and sees Miyu for whom she really is.
summary: The twenty-third game produced by Winged Cloud and the twenty-first game in the Sakura series. It is a short, free yuri visual novel starring the heroine, Miyu. It was released in October 2017.
